Breathtaking Views, 2-Story Duplex at Four Seasons Ft. Lauderdale 👀✨🌊 

Offered At: $9,499,000💥
​
Welcome to 525 N Fort Lauderdale Beach Blvd Unit 1701, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304📍
​
Experience unrivaled luxury in this exquisite 2-story duplex at Four Seasons, complete with a private elevator and jacuzzi. Set high on the 17th floor, this 4-bedroom, 4.5-bath residence offers commanding southeast ocean views through 20-foot floor-to-ceiling windows, complemented by expansive private terraces. The gourmet kitchen is a culinary masterpiece with custom Italcraft cabinetry, Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances, a wine cooler, and an outdoor summer kitchen. The opulent primary suite ensures total privacy, while lavish guest suites and spacious walk-in closets provide ultimate comfort. VIP self-parking or valet completes the experience. Schedule a private tour today!
